evidence.claim: A Homemade Plan Home Care adheres to HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
The company utilizes X12 transactions for electronic data interchange within the healthcare system.
They implement FHIR standards for interoperability with electronic health records (EHRs).
They have systems in place for HL7 messaging to ensure compatibility with clinical information systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or use of APIs for data exchange.
